price: Enti wͻdwenee ho wͻ wͻn ara wͻn mu, na wͻkekaa sε: “Nokorε sε moka abͻneεfoͻ no ho “.
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
